Uses of Class
org.forgerock.opendj.ldif.LDIFChangeRecordWriter

  • Packages that use LDIFChangeRecordWriter 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldif
    Classes and interfaces for reading and writing LDIF.

    • Uses of LDIFChangeRecordWriter in org.forgerock.opendj.ldif

      Methods in org.forgerock.opendj.ldif that return LDIFChangeRecordWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setAddUserFriendlyComments​(boolean addUserFriendlyComments)
      Specifies whether user-friendly comments should be added whenever distinguished names or UTF-8 attribute values are encountered which contained non-ASCII characters.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setExcludeAllOperationalAttributes​(boolean excludeOperationalAttributes)
      Specifies whether all operational attributes should be excluded from any change records that are written to LDIF.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setExcludeAllUserAttributes​(boolean excludeUserAttributes)
      Specifies whether all user attributes should be excluded from any change records that are written to LDIF.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setExcludeAttribute​(AttributeDescription attributeDescription)
      Excludes the named attribute from any change records that are written to LDIF.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setExcludeBranch​(DN excludeBranch)
      Excludes all change records which target entries beneath the named entry (inclusive) from being written to LDIF.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setIncludeAttribute​(AttributeDescription attributeDescription)
      Ensures that the named attribute is not excluded from any change records that are written to LDIF.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setIncludeBranch​(DN includeBranch)
      Ensures that all change records which target entries beneath the named entry (inclusive) are written to LDIF.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.setWrapColumn​(int wrapColumn)
      Specifies the column at which long lines should be wrapped.
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.writeChangeRecord​(AddRequest change)  
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.writeChangeRecord​(DeleteRequest change)  
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.writeChangeRecord​(ModifyDNRequest change)  
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.writeChangeRecord​(ModifyRequest change)  
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.writeChangeRecord​(ChangeRecord change)  
      LDIFChangeRecordWriter LDIFChangeRecordWriter.writeComment​(CharSequence comment)
